name: 3DFPS shooter (Adaptoid_17)
description:
Modifications and enhancements:

I have changed the Main Menu as per the game theme, I have used portals to transfer you into different locations like levels, instructions etc.

To pause, exit or go to main menu you have to press the "escape" key.

  • If you go to instruction you should shoot the enemies to get the way out.
  • I have modified the weapons, enemies and the portals.
  • I have used the dark theme in my levels to make the game more interesting.
  • I have also made the changes in the boss.
  • Created 2 different levels.
  • In level 2 to open the gate it requires a key which you can get after defeating the Bug  Queen.
